title: Foreign Language Reading Anxiety Mitigation Strategies for Theology Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: An environment where theology majors with expertise in medical/legal/technical fields engage with scientific foreign-language texts via an LMS, using personal devices for learning.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce anxiety levels by 30% when reading foreign-language scientific texts within six months.
Learners can establish a habit of being exposed to foreign-language texts for at least five hours per week by the third month.
Learners can apply five core reading strategies (e.g., skimming, scanning) to actual texts with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
